mapper.select: select Tb.* from ( select R.*,s.subject_name,u.user_name from subject_tb S inner join registration_tb R on S.subject_idx = R.subject_idx inner join user_tb U on s.user_id = u.user_id where R.user_id = #{user_id} order by regi_idx desc ) Tb
select Tb.*, rownum rNum from ( select V.* from video_tb V inner join subject_tb S on v.subject_idx = s.subject_idx where user_id = #{user} order by video_idx asc ) Tb
select subject_idx from subject_tb where user_id = #{idx}
mapper.update: update video_tb set VIDEO_TITLE=#{title}, VIDEO_END=#{end},server_saved=#{server} where VIDEO_IDX=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from attendance_tb where user_id = #{user} and video_idx = #{idx}
